snippet.title: Hallways - Official Gameplay Trailer | Indie Horror
snippet.description:
You must survive the night in this immersive survival horror. Utilize your limited power and generate flashlight charges to keep the attacker from getting to you from the four hallways surrounding you. Can you survive?

PLAY ON ITCH.IO: https://lost-frame-development.itch.io/hallways
WISHLIST NOW and Play Demo: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2706290/Hallways/
-------------------------------------------

Become a patron: https://www.patreon.com/LostFrameDevelopment
Join the discord community: https://discord.gg/lostframe
-------------------------------------------

Survive until 6am
- Use the wall power switches to turn on the hallway lights which will deter any attacks but uses building power. Once you run out of building power you are helpless.
- Use the generator to charge your flashlight which you can use to confirm suspicions about which direction the attacker is coming from. Once you find which hallway the attack is coming from you use the wall power switch to deter the attack.


Non-Linear Gameplay
- Never have the same thing twice, through a strong AI built from the ground up for this game you will be able to play over and over again and still have fun
- Easter Eggs, you may experience something special when you play.
